text: Ove Hansen (born 27 April 1957) is a Norwegian equestrian. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Norway Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Haugesund
title: Ove Hansen
